text: Vetamutaiyavarkale! Niccayamaka (isavukkuppin ituvaraiyilum) tutarkal varatu itaippattirunta kalattil, "nanmarayan kurupavarum, accamutti eccarippavarum akiya evarum enkalitam varave illaiye" ena ninkal kuratirukkum poruttu, ippolutu unkalukku (markkattait) telivaka etuttukkura nam tutar unkalitam vantullar. Enave nanmarayam kurupavarum, accamutti eccarippavarum unkalitam niccayamaka vantu vittar. Innum; allah ellap porutkal mitum vallamaiyutaiyavanaka irukkinran
